Html:
I searched for this but was unable to find any thing in discussion or documents about it, but also possible i was just using the wrong terms.

When I make an upgrade list it lists items below what i'm already wearing.

How do i make it list only item above what I am weearing? 

 

thank you
You aren't optimized before running the upgrade list...

Well I hit optimize button, then ran upgrade list.  Is that not the correct way?

 

Edit:  Oh i see, i had to load the optimize gear first.

 

Thanks
